name: Ball'A'Maze
description:
A simple and short ball in a maze game where you roll n' race the time to collect the pickups to proceed.

Objective: 
Collect all the pickups to record your time for each level.

How to Play: 
Collect all the pickups mentioned in the upper left of the game, then proceed to the goal to move on to the next level.

Controls:
W/A/S/D or Arrow keys : Move the ball.
